name: Darkest Anthill
description:
Darkest anthill is a game being developed by one person (hi) and was originally created for the 2021 Github gameoff gamejam.  The game is more of a prototype. Possible future full game, stay tuned!

Key Features

  • Procedural level generation
  • Random upgrades
  • Fast paced movement and bullet hell projectiles
  • Ants
